featured.text: However, even these people may look at the calendar to pick a lucky day when they make their choice.
In 1582, Pope Gregory XIII ordered a new calendar, which called for New Year’s Day to be celebrated on January 1.
Some see it as a celebration related to the turn of the seasons from winter to spring; others, however, believe that it 16 the adoption of a new calendar.

definition.zh_def: 日曆；用於顯示日期、月份和年份的系統或工具。
definition.en_def: A system or tool used to display the days, months, and years.
definition.example: I marked my birthday on the calendar.
